showroom.address: Persiaran Sentral, Gerbang Nusajaya 79200 Iskandar Puteri Johor, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Daily Operating Hours (including Public Holiday) Monday to Sunday​ 10am – 6pm

description: Located in Senadi Hills, Nadi Nusantara 2 is designed for you and your family and encourages community life. Enjoy easy access to major highways and other amenities. Only 2-5 km from Legoland®, Hospital Gleneagles, Kota Iskandar and educational institutions such as SK Medini, SMK Medini dan EduCity.
